item.title: General store!
item.dc:creator: @coola99 coola99
item.description:
@coola99 wrote:

hello i got a 562 “tkoscape” source and i need help how i can make a general store that buys stuffs i tryed this but dont works.

  case 11: // Shop Case
     //isGeneral = true;
     p.getActionSender().sendString("<col=ff0000>^^I Buy AnyThing!^^", 620, 22);
     shopopen(p, 11);
     items = GameEngine.shops.pure;
     itemsN = GameEngine.shops.pureN;
     p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 64209, 93, p.getInventory().getContainer());//Shop Inventory
     p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 63746, 556, items, itemsN);
